member.name: IJolietDiscMaster.AddData
member.summary: Adds the contents of a root storage to the staged image file. This storage will be enumerated to place all substorages and streams in the root file system of the stage image file. Substorages become folders and streams become files. Multiple calls to this method can be repeated to slowly stage an image file without wasting undue amounts of hard drive space building up a storage file.
member.param: Path to the storage whose subitems are to be added to the root of the staged image file.
If this parameter is nonzero, overwrite existing files with the same name. Otherwise, the last file added appears in the directory.
member.returns: S_OK is returned on success, but other success codes may be returned as a result of implementation. The following error codes are commonly returned on operation failure, but do not represent the only possible error values:

member.name: IJolietDiscMaster.GetDataBlockSize
member.summary: Retrieves the size of a data block.
member.param: Total size of a single data block, in bytes.
member.returns: S_OK is returned on success, but other success codes may be returned as a result of implementation. The following error codes are commonly returned on operation failure, but do not represent the only possible error values:

member.name: IJolietDiscMaster.GetJolietProperties
member.summary: Retrieves a pointer to an interface that contains the Joliet properties.
member.param: Address of a pointer to an interface for the Joliet property set with all current properties defined.
member.returns: S_OK is returned on success, but other success codes may be returned as a result of implementation. The following error codes are commonly returned on operation failure, but do not represent the only possible error values:

member.name: IJolietDiscMaster.GetTotalDataBlocks
member.summary: Retrieves the total number of blocks available for staging a Joliet data disc. The data returned from this method is valid only after a call, especially in a multi-session burn.
member.param: Total number of data blocks available on a disc.
member.returns: S_OK is returned on success, but other success codes may be returned as a result of implementation. The following error codes are commonly returned on operation failure, but do not represent the only possible error values:

member.name: IJolietDiscMaster.GetUsedDataBlocks
member.summary: Retrieves the total number of data blocks that are in use. The data returned from this method is valid only after a call, especially in a multi-session burn.
member.param: Total number of data blocks in use in the staged image.
member.returns: S_OK is returned on success, but other success codes may be returned as a result of implementation. The following error codes are commonly returned on operation failure, but do not represent the only possible error values:

member.name: IJolietDiscMaster.SetJolietProperties
member.param: Pointer to the interface that the Joliet interface can use to retrieve new settings on various properties.
member.returns: S_OK is returned on success, but other success codes may be returned as a result of implementation. The following error codes are commonly returned on operation failure, but do not represent the only possible error values:

summary.para: TheIJolietDiscMaster interface enables the staging of a CD data disc. It represents one of the formats supported by MSDiscMasterObj, and it allows the creation of a single Track-at-Once data disc. The data is written to the disc with the Joliet and ISO-9660 file systems.

A temporary folder is constructed and added to the image. This can be repeated multiple times with the directory and file structures overlapping. The overlapping file structures appear seamlessly when read back. When the overwrite option is used, overlapping paths cause the last file added to show up in the directory, while the earlier files with conflicting names are still present on the disc but now not readable by normal means.
